this_title: Once upon a time in Hungary
introduction: It is a visual poem made in a place called Boldogszer, in the mountains of Hungary live an extraordinary family that has almost nothing to do with our realities. Istvan and Reka are a couple of artists with 5 children, they are all so unique characters that everything they do is like a new life lesson. They actually live as in the past, their story may be taken from any fairy tale from 300 years ago, full of songs and rituals, living without electricity, practicing sword and bow, and 5 children not going to school. His goal: to be creators of an own life. His strategy: the Escape.
foreign_title: Once upon a time in Hungary
